Description: Spacious 1BR 1BA apartment for rent in Boston's Brighton neighborhood. This unit features hardwood flooring that greets you at the door, extends through the foyer, living area and bedroom. Small eat in dining area and kitchen with stove top/oven and refrigerator. Laundry in building. Parking may be available for rent. Heat and hot Water included. Low move in costs- 1/2 Brokers Fee, No Security Deposit! Available 9/1/23!
